title: Remembering Rush Limbaugh: The Left Hated Him Because It Feared Him | Louder with Crowder
description: Today, we pay tribute to Rush Limbaugh. If not for him, none of us would be here. We also fact-check Joe Biden’s recent CNN town hall, particularly one flagrant lie. And Biden’s gun control agenda? It’s worse than advertised.
itunes:author: Blaze Podcast Network
